law.catch_line: The Commission may maintain a testing laboratory and have tests done elsewhere....

text.section: The Commission may maintain a testing laboratory and have tests done elsewhere.

section.section: Each licensee shall pay a fraction of the yearly costs of the testing laboratory and of the tests done elsewhere.
The numerator of the fraction shall be the number of racing days with pari-mutuel betting privileges that the licensee holds during the year.
The denominator of the fraction shall be the whole number of racing days with pari-mutuel betting privileges held in the State during the year.
